articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Fossils tell tale of last primate to inhabit North America before humans - Phys.org
articles.description: The story of Ekgmowechashala, the final primate to inhabit North America before Homo sapiens or Clovis people, reads like a spaghetti Western: A grizzled and mysterious loner, against the odds, ekes out an existence on the American Plains.
